attributes.action: Repeal 15 year eligibility voting rule to UK Citizens in EU & re-run referendum.
attributes.background: UK citizens have made their homes in the EU based on access to public services under the reciprocal arrangements the EU brings. The UK has been in the EU for 40+ years. The 15 year rule is perverse and has served to disenfranchise UK citizens from this important vote. My brother is one of them.

rejection.details:
The Government has already given a commitment to carry out this change, as indicated in the response to this petition: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/112142

It is not clear what action you would like the Government to take that is different from what it is already doing.
